name: Weaviate
description: Integrate with Weaviate to query, create, get and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: Query
tools.description: Query objects from a Weaviate class using GraphQL. Supports nearVector, nearText, and BM25 search strategies.

tools.name: Create Object
tools.description: Create a new object in a Weaviate class. Provide the class name and property values.

tools.name: Get Schema
tools.description: Retrieve the full Weaviate schema including all classes, their properties, vectorizer config, and module settings.

tools.name: List Classes
tools.description: List all classes in the Weaviate schema with summary info (name, property count, vectorizer).

tools.name: Search
tools.description: Perform a hybrid (BM25 + vector) search across a Weaviate class. Combines keyword and semantic matching.
